topic.title: Opening Files From the Browser in Oxygen XML Editor/Author

keywords.indexterm: Content Author GuideOpen file from browser

body.p:
To quickly open the version of a file that is opened in the Content Fusion browser interface in either Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author:
Copy the URL of opened file in the browser.
In Oxygen XML Editor/Author, use the Open URL action from the toolbar or the File menu.
In the resulting dialog box, paste the copied URL in the URL field and click OK.
